Imagine's first version was full of cuts, but at least the audio didn't skip; this version's audio contains many errors; when Voldemort is dying, the audio stops suddenly for a second and then continues; it's not an ideal place for an audio error if you know what I mean. :D

the full movie is 2h 10 min not including credits, nearly all the torrents i have seen so far have had between 12 and 15 minutes of the film taken out. There are some obvious cuts, the first one being when the go to speak to Griphook at around 2 minutes 20. Look for HP and the DH part 2 TS TBS its around 4.5 GB but its good quality and its the whole film
